hero.subtitle: The all-in-one multi-tenant SaaS platform for modern merchants in Egypt. Accept Instapay, VCash, and grow your brand effortlessly.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.subtitle: Join hundreds of successful merchants in Egypt today.

hero.title: Empowering the Next Generation of
hero.subtitle: Buildora is a localized multi-tenant SaaS platform built to solve the unique challenges of the Egyptian e-commerce market.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide every entrepreneur in Egypt with the professional tools they need to launch, manage, and scale their business online without any technical complexity.

story.title: How it Started
story.p1: Buildora began with a simple observation: Egyptian merchants were struggling to find e-commerce platforms that truly understood their local needs.
story.p2: The challenges were clear: complex international payment setups, lack of localized support, and tools that didn't account for how business is actually done on the ground in Egypt.
story.p3: We built Buildora (under the QuickStore engine) to bridge this gap. By focusing on local integrations like Instapay and VCash, we've enabled hundreds of merchants to transition from social media selling to professional store ownership.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We constanty adapt our technology to meet the evolving needs of the Egyptian market.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: We believe professional e-commerce should be accessible to everyone, regardless of technical skill.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: Transparent pricing and honest business practices are at the core of everything we do.

cta.title: Join the Buildora Community
cta.subtitle: Be part of the revolution of Egyptian e-commerce.

hero.title: We're Here to
hero.subtitle: Have questions? Need support? Want to share feedback? Our team is ready to assist you.

form.title: Send Us a Message
form.subtitle: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.

message.label: Message
message.placeholder: Tell us how we can help you...

q1.question: How quickly can I get started?
q1.answer: You can launch your store in under 2 minutes after signing up.

q2.question: Do you offer customer support?
q2.answer: Yes! We provide email support and live chat during business hours.

q3.question: Can I use my own domain?
q3.answer: Absolutely! You can connect your custom domain or use our free subdomain.

hero.title: Pricing Built for Your
hero.subtitle: No hidden fees. No complicated contracts. Scale your business in Egypt with predictable pricing.

starter.name: Starter
starter.description: Perfect for testing your idea and small creators starting out.

professional.name: Professional
professional.description: Best for growing businesses needing custom branding and advanced tools.

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.description: For high-volume merchants needing dedicated resources and custom solutions.

q1.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade anytime?
q1.answer: Yes, you can change your plan at any time from your dashboard. Changes apply immediately.

q2.question: Are there transaction fees?
q2.answer: Buildora does not charge transaction fees. However, third-party payment providers might have their own fees.

q3.question: Do I need a credit card to start?
q3.answer: No, you can start with the Starter plan without any credit card information.

cta.title: Start Your Business Today
cta.subtitle: Join many Egyptian brands scaling with Buildora.

hero.title: How Can We
hero.subtitle: Find answers to your questions, explore our documentation, or get in touch with our dedicated support team.

email.title: Email Support
email.description: Send us an email and we'll reply within 24 hours.

chat.title: Live Chat
chat.description: Chat with our team during business hours.

q1.question: How do I verify Instapay or VCash payments?
q1.answer: Go to your Orders dashboard, click the pending order, and check the attached receipt. Once verified, click 'Confirm Payment' to activate the order.

q2.question: Can I connect my .eg or .com.eg domain?
q2.answer: Yes, we support all domain extensions. Consult our domain setup guide for step-by-step instructions.

q3.question: What happens if I reach my product limit?
q3.answer: On the Starter plan, you'll need to upgrade to the Professional plan to add more than 10 products.

contact.title: Still Need Help?
contact.subtitle: If you couldn't find what you were looking for, don't hesitate to reach out.

plans.title: Scale with Confidence
plans.subtitle: Select a plan that fits your volume. Transaction fees apply per order depending on your plan.
